item.description:
"....And we're off..." Let's take a Friday off and go to one of the worlds top race tracks. Only an hour or so away. Saratoga is wonderful! Clean and has the best horse racing there is.

Work on your flying and your handicapping!

http://www.saratogara...

Friday, Aug 20, 2010 Fabulous Fillies Day All ladies at Saratoga Race Track can enjoy a day of fashion, style and glamour!
Head to the backyard of the Track for the Lifestyle Expo and explore displays of fashion, health care, personal improvement and leisure benefitting the Breast Cancer Research Foundation.

AND.... do we want to be there for the wonderful breakfast on the track? This is awesome...."
What is Breakfast at Saratoga?
There is a buffet breakfast every day of the Saratoga racing meet from 7 a.m. - 9:30 a.m. where you can watch the horse's morning workouts. Admission to the breakfast is free. The breakfast buffet is priced at $14.95 per person, $7.95 for children between the ages of 3 and 12. If you get to the track in the morning, you can also take a tram tour of the Backstretch Area and watch the Paddock Show and Starting Gate Demonstration free of charge. "

Looks like the KFI to 5B2 (known to ATC as five bucks on the two) 93.5 miles, 53 minutes. Can we all leave here at 7:00 to make the breakfast? Do we leave at 9:00 for just some races?

http://www.airnav.com...

Charley

group.name: Fitchburg Pilots Association/EAA Chapter 1454 Meetup Site

item.name: Friday's Fabulous Fillies Day at Saratoga race track!
